title: Support Gaza Strip Relief Fund
description: A fundraising collection to support individuals and families affected by the recent invasion in the Gaza Strip. Your contributions will provide essential aid and support to those in need.

attributes.value: To provide immediate relief and assistance to the affected population.
100% of funds will go directly to humanitarian aid, including food, shelter, medical supplies, and essential services.
All transactions and fund allocations will be transparently recorded on the blockchain for accountability.
